items: How to choose a good account

sections.title: What Is a HYSA?
sections.content: A high-yield savings account (HYSA) offers a significantly higher interest rate than traditional savings. Great for emergency funds and short-term goals.

points.title: High APY
points.description: Compare rates from reputable banks and credit unions.

points.title: Easy Transfers
points.description: Ensure fast ACH transfers to and from checking.

sections.title: Remember
sections.content: Rates change. Focus on overall reliability, not just today's top APY.

sections.title: Pro Tip
sections.content: Keep everyday spending separate from your HYSA to reduce temptation.
